body.p: Perform the following steps to import a cloud instance from into :

li.p: Select File, Import Appliance to open the Import Virtual Appliance wizard.
In the Source drop-down list, select .
In the Profile drop-down list, select the cloud profile for your account.
Choose the required cloud instance from the list in the Machines field.
Click Next to make an API request to the service and display the Appliance Settings page.
(Optional) Edit settings for the new local virtual machine.
For example, you can edit the VM name and description.
